page.title: Fraun Tech Service - SCANCO Micro CT China Service Center

about.title: About Fraun Tech Service
about.desc: Founded in 2014, Shenzhen Fraun Tech Service Co., Ltd. has been deeply engaged in high-end micro imaging. As the exclusive distributor of SCANCO Medical AG in Greater China (Mainland, Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan), we have built a full-service system from basic research to clinical translation. Over 70 installations and a leading market share make us a trusted partner in the field.

stats.lead: Over 55% of global MicroCT publications use SCANCO products, with more than 7,500 papers published. As SCANCO Medical AG’s exclusive distributor in Greater China, we have established the country’s first all-in-one SCANCO Micro CT 3D imaging service platform, serving 500+ clients with 70+ local installations.

products.title: SCANCO Micro CT Product Line
products.desc: We offer benchtop ex-vivo micro-CT systems (μCT45/90), cabinet-style systems (μCT50/100/100HE), in-vivo systems (vivaCT80), and high-resolution quantitative CT (Xtreme CT II).

scan.title: Scanning Applications
scan.desc: Applicable to orthopedics, dentistry, oncology, biomedicine, cardiovascular research, materials science, geology, and paleontology.

partners.title: Partners
partners.desc: Precision beyond the micro — every micron of imaging drives cross-dimensional innovation.
